# weekday(_:)

**Instance Method**

Modifies the date format style to use the specified weekday format style.

## Declaration

```swift
func weekday(_ format: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.Weekday = .abbreviated) -> Date.FormatStyle
```

## Parameters

- **format**: The weekday format style applied to the date format style.

## Return Value

A date format style modified to include the specified week format style.

## Discussion

Possible values of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Weekday] include [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Weekday/abbreviated], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Weekday/narrow], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Weekday/oneDigit], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Weekday/short], [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Weekday/twoDigits], and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Date/FormatStyle/Symbol/Weekday/wide].

## Specifying the Date Format

- **day(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified day format style.
- **dayOfYear(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified day of the year format style.
- **era(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified era format style.
- **month(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified month format style.
- **quarter(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified quarter format style.
- **week(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified week format style.
- **year(_:)**: Modifies the date format style to use the specified year format style.
- **Date.FormatStyle.DateStyle**: Type that defines date styles varied in length or components included.
